meta.description: Optimize the purchase of metal-working equipment to minimize the total number of equipment needed while meeting steel cutting and waste constraints.

params.name: steel_capacity
params.description: Amount of steel each equipment type can process per day.

params.name: waste_generated
params.description: Amount of waste generated by each equipment type per day.

params.name: steel_demand
params.description: Total pounds of steel that must be cut every day.

params.name: waste_limit
params.description: Maximum units of waste that can be produced every day.

vars.name: num_equipment
vars.description: Number of each type of equipment to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_equipment
objective.description: Minimize the total number of metal-working equipment needed.

constraints.name: steel_demand_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total steel processed meets the daily demand.

constraints.name: waste_limit_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total waste generated does not exceed the daily limit.
